meanings.definition: Easy to approach or talk to.
meanings.sent1: The friendly librarian was very approachable and always willing to help.
meanings.sent2: The new student found the teacher to be approachable and welcoming.
meanings.sent3: The approachable puppy wagged its tail happily as the children petted it.
meanings.sent4: The cozy cafe had an approachable atmosphere that made customers feel at home.
meanings.sent5: The approachable smile on her face put everyone at ease during the meeting.

meanings.definition: Capable of being reached or entered.
meanings.sent1: The low shelf was approachable even for the smallest child to grab a book.
meanings.sent2: The mountain peak seemed approachable from a distance, but it was a challenging climb.
meanings.sent3: The approachable entrance to the castle led visitors into a world of history and wonder.
meanings.sent4: The idea of success felt approachable, like a door waiting to be opened with effort.
meanings.sent5: The approachable path through the forest beckoned hikers to explore its beauty.
